<quote xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" source="#" rend="inline">
            <l>Which into <del hand="ms">words no virtue can digest</del></l>
          </quote>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">It is a break; <add hand="ms" place="above">a [illeg.]</add> out of keeping; <del>to be recalled at once</del></l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">a sign that the dramatist is separate from the 
            <choice>
              <sic>anony ous</sic>
              <corr>anonymous</corr>
            </choice> play</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">maker; There is no little language to put on Kings lips;</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">so that he cannot as yet 
            <choice>
              <sic>amalgamante</sic>
              <corr>amalgamate</corr>
            </choice> naturally</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">the thought and the action. The audience, the 
            <choice>
              <sic>shopr keeprs</sic>
              <corr>shopkeepers</corr>
            </choice></l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">
            <choice>
              <sic>movemnt</sic>
              <corr>movement</corr>
            </choice>. The play is still partly the work of the audience;</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">of the undifferentiated gluttonous word greedy mass.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">It is inspired by the common voice, demanding great names,</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">simple 
            <choice>
              <sic>outl nes</sic>
              <corr>outlines</corr>
            </choice>; clamour and 
            <choice>
              <sic>virtory</sic>
              <corr>victory</corr>
            </choice> and death; not the 
            <choice>
              <sic>singe</sic>
              <corr>single</corr>
            </choice></l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">subtlety of one soul. <del>
            <choice>
              <sic>Refelction</sic>
              <corr>Reflection</corr>
            </choice> breaks off from</del></l>

            <choice>
